Reviews.Title: the best
Reviews.Author: J. Rondeau
Reviews.Content: this is the best we love it. we got it about 2 months ago and it takes such good pics we can even get good pics of are 1 1/2 year old who is on the go none stop they are just as clear as if he was standing still. this is so worth getting if you have kids and the battery last forever. we will never go back to any other kind of camera. the bundle is such a good deal at wal mart just the camera is 540.00 and all the stuff in the kit is good its not cheap like some kits are. love it !!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: CANON T3
Reviews.Author: LJBAR
Reviews.Content: The camera and accessories were the perfect thing for the jump to a dsl camera. All the things neccessary to get started and at a price half of those available locally. THANX

Reviews.Title: awesome buy
Reviews.Author: cordykencas
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to keep up with the other women in my husbands family. they all have digital slr's. I bought this with the money I received from my baby shower. New baby New camera. I researched alot. about 15 hours of research went into this. I loved what was offered in this bundle and the price was great. It came with everything listed, nicely packaged and within five days of my order. I loved unpacking it all and laying it out on my dining room table. chirstmas for mamma! The camers does not seem light weight to me like in some of the reviews. It is firm and heavy. The camera takes great pictures and better then the other women. yeah me! Its easy to understand yet, I can take it several steps further and become more creative and professional. The manual software it came with is very instructional. The photo software works great but is not as good as some professional software I have used. The two lenses work great, althrough I was confusd at first about how to get them on. The cleaning kit is sweet, The card is large enough to hold aton of pictures. The extras seeme fine and good quality to me. I was not expecting top notch, didnt get it but, they are better then I thought they would be. Tripod is steady. The case was too bulky for me to carry so I bought a sling case, which works perfectly for me and everything fits. I love this bundle. You cant beat this camera for the price. I also evaluated the megapixal against 18 megapixal. this is aobut 12,000 compared to 18,000 megapixals which is not a big differance expecially if you compare the much more expensive price for the higher megapixel. so, a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Christopher R Strache
Reviews.Content: Great camera with awesome features.  The package comes with all the accessories that you could want for everyday shooting.  I would recommend this product package to others.  The shipper was very helpful in letting me know about the backordered items.

Reviews.Title: good camera to start with
Reviews.Author: jorge
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for someone that is starting in the SLR world. It takes good quality pictures, but doesnt have all the features that you would find in a more expensive camera. Like i said, its a good camera to start with, to see if photography is a field you would like to get more in to, and then move up.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I have friends that are into photography and know way more about it than me...I was looking for a nice camera to capture quality photos and this was what they suggested. This package came with so many additional pieces that totaled what I would have paid for just the camera at a retail store. Great value, fun and easy to use!

Reviews.Title: A Great Camera With a So-so User's Manual
Reviews.Author: Not a Computer Type Guy
Reviews.Content: The Canon Rebel t3 is great for people who want to take great pictures using an optical viewfinder so they can actually see what  they are shooting in every shot.  For those who don't care about always seeing the shot and are willing to guess at it frequently it also has a very good screen (far better than most) which can be used.  For people who want to be creative and sometimes make their own settings instead of the automated ones for special effects, etc. it also allows that.  A good bit to learn in so using it, but good tutorials come with.  Unfortunately, for that creativity Canon provides only a rather brief summary type written manual to carry along. There is, however, a complete on line manual so you eventually will be able to remember all you need to know to be creative. It's just a bit hard to practice with the so-called manual since dragging your computer along for taking creative shots, loading the CD, reading it....well you get the picture!  Or maybe you won't!!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: Bought this product as a semi-starter set for my son.  Highly recommend for anyone who is just starting to get serious about photography.  Has all the basic items for someone to start a new hobby or grow in an existing hobby.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for an bigginer!!!
Reviews.Author: SaipanFlip
Reviews.Content: Product is perfect for bigginers, easy to use and easy to handle, a perfect entry level DSLR. Great all rounder camera, but could use some help at night.

Reviews.Title: Great bundle!
Reviews.Author: D. Wedwick
Reviews.Content: Getting the kit (camera and lens) is not enough - you need a memory card, tripod, carrying case...  you need what's in this bundle!  Excellent for the price.

Reviews.Title: Canon Rebel T3 EOS
Reviews.Author: Sara
Reviews.Content: I could not be happier with this purchase. My canon rebel t3 eos works great! I am looking forward to learning all the features on this camera and making the most of this purchase. Great buy for the money!

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Sabrina
Reviews.Content: This product is awesome!! The price is amazing low for the quality. I bought this about a year ago and everything in this bundle is amazing, couldn't be happier. The only downside was that they forgot to ship the two additional lenses to me. I called and they had them shipped very quickly with no additional costs. Very friendly and wanting to help. Great product! Great camera for beginners!

Reviews.Title: Great combo
Reviews.Author: T. Hartley
Reviews.Content: this is a really good setup. everything you need to start taking pictures. Canon does not include a memory card. This is just dumb. the wide angle filter is ok, but the zoom creates pictures that are fuzzy around the edges. you would be far better off to get real zoom and wide angle lenses. these 2 are not that great.

Reviews.Title: Really BIG BUNDLE!
Reviews.Author: cece678
Reviews.Content: Okay, so just to put this out there...This bundle does have a include a neck strap and power plug! I was worried it didn't since it didn't specify.This is my first DSLR camera and so far I am happy playing with it! I had a SLR Minolta for a while then I went to a regular point and shoot which didn't allow me much control.Well, this camera does! I haven't tried the tripod yet but my sister(who also has this bundle) likes it a lot.I CANNOT express how awesome the quality is, even with video. Its very crisp and clear.The adapter lens that attaches to the camera is cool too though I didn't know at first how to screw on the lenses and filter.I highly recommend this bundle since for this price you can only get the camera body and not the lens anywhere else.

Reviews.Title: It's awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: beansheller
Reviews.Content: I can not rave about this camera enough.  Although I haven't used the different lenses, I will learn that eventually, this camera takes amazing pictures and fast pictures.  My last camera you had to wait a minute or so after taking a picture to be able to take another picture.  Not with this camera it's fast and accurate and easy.

Reviews.Title: Great deal for the whole package
Reviews.Author: J. C. Coats
Reviews.Content: After researching I found this bundle to be an amazing deal! Other shops were selling the same camera/lens(only) for more than the cost of the entire package.This is my first DSLR camera - I previously pruchased an advance point&shoot; (Nikon L810) but decided I wanted something that gave me more creative control.  So happy I exchanged the L810 for the T3!I was able to take great pictures straight out of the box using some of the auto controls and love that I am able to experiment with the shutter speed and aperture individually and/or simulataneously.I am addicted to taking pictures now!PS - Cameta Camera shop were the best when it came to purchasing, exchanging, shipping times etc.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: mel
Reviews.Content: I had this camera package for a great deal. The camera have a good quality except for the other products included. The products doesnt have a good smell. It smells like plastic..

ProductInfo.Features:

<1> Canon EOS Rebel T3 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens + <2> Transcend 16GB SDHC 300x Card + <3> .45x Wide Angle Lens (58mm) +
<4> 2x Telephoto Lens (58mm) + <5> Spare LP-E10 Battery for Canon + <6> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter +
<7> Precision Design 57" Tripod + <8> PD Digital SLR Camera Case + <9> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens with 16GB Card + .45x Wide Angle & 2x Telephoto Lenses + Battery + Filter + Tripod + Accessory Kit
